alert.note: Alert for Clayton; Fayette; Henry (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 04 at 12:24AM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Fayette, western Henry and Clayton Counties through 100 AM EST... At 1224 AM EST, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from near Peachtree City to Inman to Lovejoy, and moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Fayetteville, Jonesboro, Peachtree City, Stockbridge, Forest Park, Riverdale, Hampton, Morrow, Lovejoy, Woolsey, Lake Spivey, Rex, Inman, Bonanza, Atlanta Motor Speedway, Jw Smith Reservoir, Flippen, Lake Horton, Eagles Landing and Irondale. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
